catalog_script_client.name: Hide variable set Req2

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_a685d8f8939b265005b6367efaba1058
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Request Desktop or Laptop">5fc33510939ba25005b6367efaba1027</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0eed391c939ba25005b6367efaba1099</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Hide variable set Req2</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[// function onLoad() {
//     //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
// 	toggleVariableSet();
// }

function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue){
	toggleVariableSet();
}
function toggleVariableSet(){
	var triggerValue = g_form.getValue('is_this_request_for_a_broken_item');
	console.log("value: " + triggerValue);

	if (triggerValue == 'yes') {
		g_form.setDisplay('requested_item', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('select_operating_system', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('quantity', false);
		g_form.setDisplay('request_type', false);
	}
	else{
		g_form.setDisplay('requested_item', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('select_operating_system', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('quantity', true);
		g_form.setDisplay('request_type', true);
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-08 19:43:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a685d8f8939b265005b6367efaba1058</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hide variable set Req2</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="MyServiceDesk" source="x_1808462_mysdesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="MyServiceDesk">bcb2fd1c935ba25005b6367efaba10ed</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_a685d8f8939b265005b6367efaba1058</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-08 22:55:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>true</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
